alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 4:18PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Itawamba and northeastern Monroe Counties through 445 PM CST... At 418 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amory, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amory, Smithville, Hatley, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Quincy, Bigbee, Turon, Splunge and Parham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
